description_en: A core exercise focusing on the obliques (both).
instructions_en: Sit on floor, knees bent, heels down or elevated
Keep hips stable - only torso rotates
tips_en: Moving hips instead of torso → Keep hips stationary
Going too fast → Slow, controlled rotation
Using too heavy weight → Light weight, proper form

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the obliques.
instructions_en: Rotate torso, pulling cable diagonally down
Pivot on feet, rotate through hips

description_en: A core exercise focusing on the obliques.

instructions_en: Hang from bar, raise legs to vertical (toes toward ceiling)
Rotate legs side to side like windshield wipers
One of the hardest oblique exercises!
